NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 COLEUS: Yes, yes... You're so close..! 2 1 COLEUS: No! It scampered off again... 3 2 COLEUS: You saw the vision orb move up slightly, didn't you, Oeno? Neither of us were looking directly at the orb, were we? 4 3 COLEUS: I've been adjusting our vision orbs to accomodate the native lifeforms' vision so they can be able to use them too. I'm quite hopeful they'll learn to use it soon! 5 4 OENO: I wish I could credit their eyes for that, Coleus - but I'm afraid it's more likely that may have just been the Attlerock's gravity tugging the vision orb upwards as it orbited overhead! 6 5 COLEUS: Was the Attlerock orbiting overhead just now? Curses.. I can't seem to get them to look at the vision orb long enough without them becoming distracted! 7 6 CYCAD: Were you playing with the native lifeforms again, Coleus? You sure love teaching them more about our culture and technology! 8 7 COLEUS: Of course! It's lovely seeing these lifeforms learn and grow more curious, now that they've grown much more comfortable with our presence. 9 8 CYCAD: Oh, before I forget! Coleus: Yarrow was looking for you! There appears to be some issue regarding the warp towers on Ash Twin which he wanted you to look into. 10 9 COLEUS: How vague.. Did he mention what sort of problem it was? 11 10 CYCAD: Apparently, the Sun Station crew reported to Yarrow that they noticed their warp tower's rotating doors opening and closing by themselves, without any sort of input. 12 11 CYCAD: When Yarrow went to check on the issue, he noticed the same thing happening to the rotating doors to Timber Hearth's warp tower! 13 12 COLEUS: How strange.. My thanks for delivering this message, Cycad. I shall travel to Ash Twin to catch up with Yarrow and investigate this issue as soon as I can! Nomai Mine Entry 2 8
